item.title: I need server admin help
item.dc:creator: @Zachary825 Zachary825
item.description:
@Zachary825 wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:2, topic:50116”]ok,
First…
Click on character file
Click your account name
When your in there
Look for player rights = 0
simply change then to 1,2,3 for mod,admin,owner[/quote]
For testscape tat wont work, u get NO errors,? idk

item.title: I need server admin help
item.dc:creator: @RACERDAN RACERDAN
item.description:
@RACERDAN wrote:

Can anyone help me im using testscape and ive edited the admin bit then compiled it no errors and still wont make admins.

Heres the code ive edited:

[code=html4strict] //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“RacerDan”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“sarican”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Richard123”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Sherbenka”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 05:58:05 AM[/size][hr]does anyone know where i am going wrong?

Read full topic
